message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today.  I think you'll find it's worth a lot more than my asking price of $190.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $120 for it.
Bob, I understand your initial offer, but I'm confident this product offers you more value than that. How about we meet in the middle at $170?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I still believe $120 is a fair price given my budget constraints.
Bob, I'm sensing you're pretty set on that $120 price.  I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I can't go that low.  Would you consider $155?
Alice, thank you for considering my position. I am unable to increase my offer beyond $120. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
